column5: Canadian power and sail squadron courses will be starting in January.  Need a last minute gift idea?  Reports from the locals  on the OFC  BOQ get together weekend wern't favourable, maybe some that thought they had right of way could use a refresher.
I've done mine. Was at BOQ too. With so many boats trolling a small area, the rules and regs get twisted a bit. Using planer boards just compounds the problem.
